page.title: 04Employment in Kensworth Area
page.content: Occupations and Industries in this area are,apart from farming,not necessary of a rural nature.We are part of the commuter belt.People travel to London daily while others work in the local towns such as Dunstable,Hemel Hempstead,Luton and Watford.These have large engineering,printing,building and construction industries together with retail shop outlets.We do have our own industrial estate at Kensworth comprising six separate units which employ some local labour.There are two garden centres and an animal feed business all owned by local residents who employ staff from the villages.The village shops and public houses run by the owners and their families who usually live above the premises provide part time work for local ladies.
